sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.getProductCount */ COUNT(1) FROM TB_PRODUCT_MASTER A , TB_PRODUCT_NAME B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD#
AND A.PROD_NO = #SEARCH_PROD_NO#
AND ( B.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_PROD_NM#,'%') OR B.PROD_SHORT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_PROD_NM#,'%') )
AND A.PROD_LCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_LCATE_CD#
AND A.PROD_MCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_MCATE_CD#
AND A.PROD_SCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_SCATE_CD#
AND A.BRAND_CD = #SEARCH_BRAND_CD#

SELECT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.getProductList */ A.PROD_NO , B.PROD_NM , B.PROD_SHORT_NM , A.BRAND_CD , FN_GET_CODE_NM('BRAND', A.BRAND_CD, #LANG_CD#) AS BRAND_NM , A.PROD_LCATE_CD , A.PROD_MCATE_CD , A.PROD_SCATE_CD , A.PROD_DCATE_CD , CONCAT(L.CATE_NAME, '>', M.CATE_NAME, '>', S.CATE_NAME, CASE WHEN A.PROD_DCATE_CD IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT('>', D.CATE_NAME) END ) AS CATEGORY_NM , A.WORKING_YN , A.SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID , A.MAKE_COUNTRY , A.SUPPLY_COUNTRY , FN_GET_CODE_NM('CURRENCY', A.SUPPLY_CURRENCY, #LANG_CD#) AS SUPPLY_CURRENCY_NM , A.SUPPLY_CURRENCY , A.ORG_PRICE , A.DUTY_FREE_YN , A.VOLUME_UNIT , A.VOLUME , A.WEIGHT_UNIT , A.WEIGHT , A.SALES_SKU , A.PER_BOX_PROD_CNT , A.SELL_VALID_MONTHS , A.SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN , A.SEEN_PARTNER_YN , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.SALES_START_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALES_START_DT , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.SALES_END_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALES_END_DT , A.RECOMMEND_YN FROM TB_PRODUCT_MASTER A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_NAME B ON A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM L ON A.PROD_LCATE_CD = L.CATE_CODE AND L.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM M ON A.PROD_MCATE_CD = M.CATE_CODE AND M.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM S ON A.PROD_SCATE_CD = S.CATE_CODE AND S.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM D ON A.PROD_SCATE_CD = D.CATE_CODE AND S.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.PROD_NO = #SEARCH_PROD_NO#
AND ( B.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_PROD_NM#,'%') OR B.PROD_SHORT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_PROD_NM#,'%') )
AND A.PROD_LCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_LCATE_CD#
AND A.PROD_MCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_MCATE_CD#
AND A.PROD_SCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_SCATE_CD#
AND A.PROD_DCATE_CD = #SEARCH_PROD_DCATE_CD#
AND A.BRAND_CD = #SEARCH_BRAND_CD#
ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC

SELECT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.getProductDetail */ A.PROD_NO , B.PROD_NM , A.BRAND_CD , A.PROD_LCATE_CD , A.PROD_MCATE_CD , A.PROD_SCATE_CD , A.PROD_DCATE_CD , CONCAT(L.CATE_NAME, '>', M.CATE_NAME, '>', S.CATE_NAME, CASE WHEN A.PROD_DCATE_CD IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONCAT('>', D.CATE_NAME) END ) AS CATEGORY_NM , A.WORKING_YN , A.SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID , C.COMP_NM AS SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_NM , A.MAKE_COUNTRY , A.SUPPLY_COUNTRY , A.SUPPLY_CURRENCY , A.ORG_PRICE , A.DUTY_FREE_YN , A.VOLUME_UNIT , A.VOLUME , A.WEIGHT_UNIT , A.WEIGHT , A.SALES_SKU , A.PER_BOX_PROD_CNT , A.SELL_VALID_MONTHS , A.SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN , A.SEEN_PARTNER_YN , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.SALES_START_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALES_START_DT , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.SALES_END_DT, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALES_END_DT , A.RECOMMEND_YN FROM TB_PRODUCT_MASTER A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_NAME B ON A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COMPANY_MASTER C ON A.SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID = C.BIZ_ENTITY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM L ON A.PROD_LCATE_CD = L.CATE_CODE AND L.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM M ON A.PROD_MCATE_CD = M.CATE_CODE AND M.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM S ON A.PROD_SCATE_CD = S.CATE_CODE AND S.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM D ON A.PROD_SCATE_CD = D.CATE_CODE AND S.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# WHERE A.PROD_NO= #SEARCH_PROD_NO#
SELECT /* Comm_Code_Mysql.xml commcode.getCodeNameList */ A.LANG_CD , A.PROD_SHORT_NM , A.PROD_NM , A.PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT FROM TB_PRODUCT_NAME A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROD_NO= #SEARCH_PROD_NO#
SELECT /* Company_Mysql.xml product.getProdNo */ CONCAT(#SUPPLY_COUNTRY#, IFNULL((SELECT LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(PROD_NO, 3, 5))+1, 5, '0') AS SERIAL_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT_MASTER), '00001')) FROM DUAL;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.insertProduct */ INTO TB_PRODUCT_MASTER ( PROD_NO , BRAND_CD , PROD_LCATE_CD , PROD_MCATE_CD , PROD_SCATE_CD , PROD_DCATE_CD , WORKING_YN , SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID , MAKE_COUNTRY , SUPPLY_COUNTRY , SUPPLY_CURRENCY , ORG_PRICE , DUTY_FREE_YN , VOLUME_UNIT , VOLUME , WEIGHT_UNIT , WEIGHT , SALES_SKU , PER_BOX_PROD_CNT , SELL_VALID_MONTHS , SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN , SEEN_PARTNER_YN , SALES_START_DT , SALES_END_DT , RECOMMEND_YN , INSERT_USER_ID , INSERT_DT) VALUES ( #PROD_NO# , #BRAND_CD# , #PROD_LCATE_CD# , #PROD_MCATE_CD# , #PROD_SCATE_CD# , #PROD_DCATE_CD# , #WORKING_YN# , #SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID# , #MAKE_COUNTRY# , #SUPPLY_COUNTRY# , #SUPPLY_CURRENCY# , #ORG_PRICE# , #DUTY_FREE_YN# , #VOLUME_UNIT# , #VOLUME# , #WEIGHT_UNIT# , #WEIGHT# , #SALES_SKU# , #PER_BOX_PROD_CNT# , #SELL_VALID_MONTHS# , #SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN# , #SEEN_PARTNER_YN# , #SALES_START_DT# , #SALES_END_DT# , #RECOMMEND_YN# , #LOGIN_ID# , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /* Product_Mysql.xml product.updateProduct */ TB_PRODUCT_MASTER SET BRAND_CD = #BRAND_CD# , PROD_LCATE_CD = #PROD_LCATE_CD# , PROD_MCATE_CD = #PROD_MCATE_CD# , PROD_SCATE_CD = #PROD_SCATE_CD# , PROD_DCATE_CD = #PROD_DCATE_CD# , WORKING_YN = #WORKING_YN# , SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID = #SELLER_BIZ_ENTITY_ID# , MAKE_COUNTRY = #MAKE_COUNTRY# , SUPPLY_COUNTRY = #SUPPLY_COUNTRY# , SUPPLY_CURRENCY = #SUPPLY_CURRENCY# , ORG_PRICE = #ORG_PRICE# , DUTY_FREE_YN = #DUTY_FREE_YN# , VOLUME_UNIT = #VOLUME_UNIT# , VOLUME = #VOLUME# , WEIGHT_UNIT = #WEIGHT_UNIT# , WEIGHT = #WEIGHT# , SALES_SKU = #SALES_SKU# , PER_BOX_PROD_CNT = #PER_BOX_PROD_CNT# , SELL_VALID_MONTHS = #SELL_VALID_MONTHS# , SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN = #SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN# , SEEN_PARTNER_YN = #SEEN_PARTNER_YN# , SALES_START_DT = #SALES_START_DT# , SALES_END_DT = #SALES_END_DT# , RECOMMEND_YN = #RECOMMEND_YN# , UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# , UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE PROD_NO = #PROD_NO#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.saveProdNm */ INTO TB_PRODUCT_NAME ( PROD_NO , LANG_CD , PROD_NM , PROD_SHORT_NM , PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT , INSERT_USER_ID , INSERT_DT) VALUES ( #PROD_NO# , #LANG_CD# , #PROD_NM# , #PROD_SHORT_NM# , #PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT# , #LOGIN_ID# , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PROD_NM = #PROD_NM# , PROD_SHORT_NM = #PROD_SHORT_NM# , PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT = #PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT# , UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# , UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE /* Product_Mysql.xml product.deleteProduct */ FROM TB_PRODUCT_MASTER WHERE PROD_NO = #PROD_NO#
DELETE /* Product_Mysql.xml product.deleteProductNm */ FROM TB_PRODUCT_NAME WHERE PROD_NO = #PROD_NO#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* Product_Mysql.xml product.getCategoryList */ A.CATE_CODE , B.CATE_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY A , TB_CATEGORY_NM B WHERE A.CATE_CODE = B.CATE_CODE AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD#
AND A.CATE_LEVEL = #CATE_LEVEL#
AND A.UPPER_CATE_CODE = #UPPER_CATE_CODE# AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATE_ORDER
